abstract: Industry observers seemed to cast a jaundiced eye yesterday over a plan unveiled by Citigroup, Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase, with active encouragement from the Treasury Department, to keep the housing-related debt crisis from worsening.
lead_paragraph: Industry observers seemed to cast a jaundiced eye yesterday over a plan unveiled by Citigroup, Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase, with active encouragement from the Treasury Department, to keep the housing-related debt crisis from worsening.

headline.main: Is Banks’ Funding Plan Just Spin?
